review: I purchased this gadget at half price when it first became available and put it away when it lost my network, hoping that this would be fixed by a subsequent downloaded update.  However, I recently reconnected it and did a manual update, and the problem is not solved.  I successfully watched a Netflix video, but, when I came back the next day, the device could not access our network.  Amazon offered a very generous two month return period, but I have exceeded it.

review: This exceeded my expectations. Admittedly I use this for a limited set of features - primarily as a client for a Plex server and also occasionally for the Amazon TV - but I can say that it excels at those two things. It replaced an older Google TV box from Sony (NSZ-GS8) and it is significantly faster when loading media from Plex.There seem to be no problems with the wireless connection. The interface is smooth. App run smoothly.Overall, I'm very impressed!!
